suggestions.original: To enhance the line texture in the artwork, consider adding more defined strokes and shading to the black walls. This will create a greater contrast and depth, making the background more engaging. Additionally, incorporating varied line textures in the dog's fur can further emphasize the different layers and dimensions. Experimenting with different brush techniques and line weights can also add more richness to the overall texture of the piece.
